name: Speedrun the Game
summary: Speedrun the Game is a stereotypical “save the princess” kind of game, but with a twist. You do go to the castle, defeat the bad guys, and save the princess, but the whole point of the game is to play it over and over to get a faster time, achievements, hats, mini games, etc. Every time you play the game, there’s something different about it than the last time you played!
